name: eHow
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Whether you want to learn the best way to boil an egg, cut down on utility costs, lose a few pounds, or take the perfect photo, eHow is here to help. From practical solutions to creative tips, tricks, and helpful hacks, eHow empowers you handle whatever life throws your way – providing answers to what you need to know and what you want to know.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
